line_1: Or the great labours of the field degrade,
line_2: With the new peril of a poorer trade?

line_1: Then deign to bless a soul, who'll ne'er degrade
line_2: Your gift, tho' sharpest miseries invade!

line_1: Come then, ye self-curs'd atheists! who degrade
line_2: Truth to a sound, and scripture to a trade;
Yet, seeing this, could be betray'd,
